name: Storify
short_description:
Storify is a social network service allowing users to create stories and
timelines using social media platforms.
long_description:
Turn what people post on social media into compelling stories. With Storify, you
collect the best photos, video, quotes from Twitter, Instagram, YouTube and more
to publish them as simple, beautiful stories that can be embedded anywhere. It's
the best way to capture an event whether it's a news event, a conference, a
product launch, a wedding, ... Social media streams flow, but stories last.
